00098 BOOLEAN StartInteractiveObject( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usStructureID, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubDirection )
00099 {
00100       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00101 
00102   // ATE: Patch fix: Don't allow if alreay in animation
00103   if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_STRUCT || pSoldier->usAnimState == OPEN_STRUCT_CROUCHED ||
00104        pSoldier->usAnimState == BEGIN_OPENSTRUCT || pSoldier->usAnimState == BEGIN_OPENSTRUCT_CROUCHED )
00105   {
00106     return( FALSE );
00107   }
00108 
00109       pStructure = FindStructureByID( sGridNo, usStructureID );
00110       if (pStructure == NULL)
00111       {
00112             return( FALSE );
00113       }
00114       if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR)
00115       {
00116             // Add soldier event for opening door....
00117             pSoldier->ubPendingAction = MERC_OPENDOOR;
00118             pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 = usStructureID;
00119             pSoldier->sPendingActionData2  = sGridNo;
00120             pSoldier->bPendingActionData3  = ubDirection;
00121             pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
00122 
00123 
00124       }     
00125       else
00126       {
00127             // Add soldier event for opening door....
00128             pSoldier->ubPendingAction = MERC_OPENSTRUCT;
00129             pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 = usStructureID;
00130             pSoldier->sPendingActionData2  = sGridNo;
00131             pSoldier->bPendingActionData3  = ubDirection;
00132             pSoldier->ubPendingActionAnimCount = 0;
00133 
00134       }
00135 
00136       return( TRUE );
00137 }

00140 BOOLEAN CalcInteractiveObjectAPs( INT16 sGridNo, STRUCTURE * pStructure, INT16 *psAPCost, INT16 *psBPCost )
00141 {
00142       if (pStructure == NULL)
00143       {
00144             return( FALSE );
00145       }
00146       if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR)
00147       {
00148             // For doors, if open, we can safely add APs for closing
00149             // If closed, we do not know what to do yet...
00150             //if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
00151             //{
00152                   *psAPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00153                   *psBPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00154             //}
00155             //else
00156             //{
00157             //    *psAPCost = 0;
00158             //    *psBPCost = 0;
00159             //}
00160       }     
00161       else
00162       {
00163             *psAPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00164             *psBPCost = AP_OPEN_DOOR;
00165       }
00166 
00167       return( TRUE );
00168 }

00171 BOOLEAN InteractWithInteractiveObject( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, STRUCTURE *pStructure, UINT8 ubDirection )
00172 {
00173       BOOLEAN     fDoor = FALSE;
00174 
00175       if (pStructure == NULL)
00176       {
00177             return( FALSE );
00178       }
00179 
00180       if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR)
00181       {
00182             fDoor = TRUE;
00183       }     
00184 
00185       InteractWithOpenableStruct( pSoldier, pStructure, ubDirection, fDoor );
00186 
00187       return( TRUE );
00188 }

00191 BOOLEAN SoldierHandleInteractiveObject( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00192 {
00193       STRUCTURE               *pStructure;
00194       UINT16                        usStructureID;
00195       INT16                         sGridNo;
00196             
00197 
00198       sGridNo                             = pSoldier->sPendingActionData2;
00199       usStructureID           = (UINT16)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1;
00200 
00201       // HANDLE SOLDIER ACTIONS
00202       pStructure = FindStructureByID( sGridNo, usStructureID );
00203       if (pStructure == NULL)
00204       {
00205             //DEBUG MSG!
00206             return( FALSE );
00207       }
00208       
00209   return( HandleOpenableStruct( pSoldier, sGridNo, pStructure ) );
00210 }

00212 void HandleStructChangeFromGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo )
00213 {
00214       STRUCTURE               *pStructure, *pNewStructure;
00215       INT16                         sAPCost = 0, sBPCost = 0;
00216       ITEM_POOL               *pItemPool;
00217   BOOLEAN       fDidMissingQuote = FALSE;
00218 
00219       pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_OPENABLE );
00220 
00221       if ( pStructure == NULL )
00222       {
00223 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00224             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"ERROR: Told to handle struct that does not exist at %d.", sGridNo );                  
00225 #endif
00226             return;
00227       }
00228 
00229       // Do sound...
00230       if ( !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN ) )
00231       {
00232             // Play Opening sound...
00233             PlayJA2Sample( GetStructureOpenSound( pStructure, FALSE ), RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );                  
00234       }
00235       else
00236       {
00237             // Play Opening sound...
00238             PlayJA2Sample( ( GetStructureOpenSound( pStructure, TRUE ) ), RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );               
00239       }
00240 
00241       // ATE: Don't handle switches!
00242       if ( !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH ) )
00243       {
00244             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00245             {
00246                   if ( sGridNo == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_GRIDNO && gWorldSectorX == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_X && gWorldSectorY == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Y && gbWorldSectorZ == BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_SECTOR_Z && CheckFact( FACT_PABLOS_STOLE_FROM_LATEST_SHIPMENT, 0 ) && !(CheckFact( FACT_PLAYER_FOUND_ITEMS_MISSING, 0) ) )
00247                   {
00248                         SayQuoteFromNearbyMercInSector( BOBBYR_SHIPPING_DEST_GRIDNO, 3, QUOTE_STUFF_MISSING_DRASSEN );
00249         fDidMissingQuote = TRUE;
00250                   }
00251             }
00252             else if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
00253             {
00254                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00255                   {
00256                         TriggerNPCWithGivenApproach( pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_DONE_OPEN_STRUCTURE, FALSE );
00257                   }
00258             }
00259 
00260 
00261             // LOOK for item pool here...
00262             if ( GetItemPool( (INT16)sGridNo, &pItemPool, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
00263             {
00264                   // Update visiblity....
00265                   if ( !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN ) )
00266                   {
00267                         BOOLEAN fDoHumm               = TRUE;
00268                         BOOLEAN     fDoLocators = TRUE;
00269 
00270                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00271                         {
00272                               fDoHumm                 = FALSE;
00273                               fDoLocators = FALSE;
00274                         }
00275 
00276                         // Look for ownership here....
00277                         if (  gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o.usItem == OWNERSHIP )
00278                         {
00279                               fDoHumm                 = FALSE;
00280                               TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_DO_BATTLE_SND, BATTLE_SOUND_NOTHING , 500 );
00281                         }
00282 
00283                         // If now open, set visible...
00284                         SetItemPoolVisibilityOn( pItemPool, ANY_VISIBILITY_VALUE, fDoLocators );
00285 
00286                         // Display quote!
00287                         //TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, (UINT16)( QUOTE_SPOTTED_SOMETHING_ONE + Random( 2 ) ) );
00288 
00289                         // ATE: Check now many things in pool.....
00290         if ( !fDidMissingQuote )
00291         {
00292                           if ( pItemPool->pNext != NULL )
00293                           {
00294                                 if ( pItemPool->pNext->pNext != NULL )
00295                                 {
00296                                       fDoHumm = FALSE;
00297 
00298                                       TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_DO_BATTLE_SND, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 , 500 );
00299 
00300                                 }
00301                           }
00302 
00303                           if ( fDoHumm )
00304                           {
00305                                 TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_DO_BATTLE_SND, BATTLE_SOUND_HUMM , 500 );
00306                           }
00307         }
00308                   }
00309                   else
00310                   {
00311                         SetItemPoolVisibilityHidden( pItemPool );
00312                   }
00313             }
00314             else
00315             {
00316                   if ( !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN ) )
00317                   {
00318                         TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_DO_BATTLE_SND, BATTLE_SOUND_NOTHING , 500 );
00319                   }
00320             }
00321       }
00322 
00323       // Deduct points!
00324       // CalcInteractiveObjectAPs( sGridNo, pStructure, &sAPCost, &sBPCost );
00325       // DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBPCost );
00326 
00327 
00328 
00329       pNewStructure = SwapStructureForPartner( sGridNo, pStructure );
00330       if ( pNewStructure != NULL)
00331       {
00332             RecompileLocalMovementCosts( sGridNo );
00333             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00334             if ( pNewStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH )
00335             {
00336                   // just turned a switch on!
00337                   ActivateSwitchInGridNo( pSoldier->ubID, sGridNo );
00338             }
00339       }
00340 
00341 }

00344 
00345 UINT32 GetInteractiveTileCursor( UINT32 uiOldCursor, BOOLEAN fConfirm )
00346 { 
00347       LEVELNODE    *pIntNode;
00348       STRUCTURE    *pStructure;
00349       INT16              sGridNo;
00350 
00351       // OK, first see if we have an in tile...
00352       pIntNode = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sGridNo, &pStructure );
00353 
00354       if ( pIntNode != NULL && pStructure != NULL )
00355       {
00356             if( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR )
00357             {
00358                   SetDoorString( sGridNo );
00359 
00360                   if ( fConfirm )
00361                   {
00362                         return( OKHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR );
00363                   }
00364                   else
00365                   {
00366                         return( NORMALHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR );
00367                   }
00368 
00369             }
00370             else
00371             {
00372               if( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH )
00373               {
00374                     wcscpy( gzIntTileLocation, gzLateLocalizedString[ 25 ] );
00375                     gfUIIntTileLocation = TRUE;
00376       }
00377 
00378 
00379                   if ( fConfirm )
00380                   {
00381                         return( OKHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR );
00382                   }
00383                   else
00384                   {
00385                         return( NORMALHANDCURSOR_UICURSOR );
00386                   }
00387             }
00388 
00389       }
00390 
00391       return( uiOldCursor );
00392 }

00394 void SetActionModeDoorCursorText( )
00395 { 
00396       LEVELNODE    *pIntNode;
00397       STRUCTURE    *pStructure;
00398       INT16              sGridNo;
00399 
00400   // If we are over a merc, don't
00401   if ( gfUIFullTargetFound )
00402   {
00403     return;
00404   }
00405 
00406       // OK, first see if we have an in tile...
00407       pIntNode = GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( &sGridNo, &pStructure );
00408 
00409       if ( pIntNode != NULL && pStructure != NULL )
00410       {
00411             if( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR )
00412             {
00413                   SetDoorString( sGridNo );
00414             }
00415       }
00416 }

00419 void GetLevelNodeScreenRect( LEVELNODE *pNode, SGPRect *pRect, INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, INT16 sGridNo )
00420 {
00421             INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
00422             INT16 sOffsetX, sOffsetY;
00423             INT16 sTempX_S, sTempY_S;
00424             ETRLEObject *pTrav;
00425             UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
00426             TILE_ELEMENT *TileElem;
00427                         
00428 
00429 
00430             // Get 'TRUE' merc position
00431             sOffsetX = sXPos - gsRenderCenterX;
00432             sOffsetY = sYPos - gsRenderCenterY;
00433 
00434             FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sOffsetX, sOffsetY, &sTempX_S, &sTempY_S );
00435 
00436             if ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_CACHEDANITILE )
00437             {
00438                   pTrav = &(gpTileCache[ pNode->pAniTile->sCachedTileID ].pImagery->vo->pETRLEObject[ pNode->pAniTile->sCurrentFrame ] );
00439             }
00440             else
00441             {
00442                   TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[pNode->usIndex]);
00443                   
00444                   //Adjust for current frames and animations....
00445                   if ( TileElem->uiFlags & ANIMATED_TILE)
00446                   {
00447                         Assert( TileElem->pAnimData != NULL );
00448                         TileElem = &gTileDatabase[TileElem->pAnimData->pusFrames[TileElem->pAnimData->bCurrentFrame]];
00449                   }
00450                   else if( ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_ANIMATION ) )
00451                   {
00452                         if ( pNode->sCurrentFrame != -1  )
00453                         {
00454                               Assert( TileElem->pAnimData != NULL );
00455                               TileElem = &gTileDatabase[TileElem->pAnimData->pusFrames[pNode->sCurrentFrame]];
00456                         }
00457                   }
00458 
00459                   pTrav = &(TileElem->hTileSurface->pETRLEObject[ TileElem->usRegionIndex ] );
00460             }
00461 
00462             sScreenX = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) + (INT16)sTempX_S;
00463             sScreenY = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) + (INT16)sTempY_S;
00464 
00465             // Adjust for offset position on screen
00466             sScreenX -= gsRenderWorldOffsetX;
00467             sScreenY -= gsRenderWorldOffsetY;
00468             sScreenY -= gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
00469 
00470             // Adjust based on interface level
00471             if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00472             {
00473                   sScreenY += ROOF_LEVEL_HEIGHT;
00474             }
00475 
00476             // Adjust for render height
00477             sScreenY += gsRenderHeight;
00478 
00479 
00480 
00481             usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
00482             usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
00483 
00484             // Add to start position of dest buffer
00485             sScreenX += ( pTrav->sOffsetX - ( WORLD_TILE_X/2 ) );
00486             sScreenY += ( pTrav->sOffsetY - ( WORLD_TILE_Y/2 ) );
00487 
00488             // Adjust y offset!
00489             sScreenY += ( WORLD_TILE_Y/2);
00490 
00491             pRect->iLeft            = sScreenX;
00492             pRect->iTop             = sScreenY;
00493             pRect->iBottom    = sScreenY + usHeight;
00494             pRect->iRight           = sScreenX + usWidth;
00495 }

00505 
00506 void LogMouseOverInteractiveTile( INT16 sGridNo )
00507 {
00508       SGPRect                       aRect;
00509       INT16                         sXMapPos, sYMapPos, sScreenX, sScreenY;
00510       LEVELNODE               *pNode;
00511 
00512       // OK, for now, don't allow any interactive tiles on higher interface level!
00513       if ( gsInterfaceLevel > 0 )
00514       {
00515             return;
00516       }
00517 
00518       // Also, don't allow for mercs who are on upper level...
00519       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bLevel == 1 )
00520       {
00521             return;
00522       }
00523 
00524       // Get World XY From gridno
00525       ConvertGridNoToCellXY( sGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
00526 
00527       // Set mouse stuff
00528       sScreenX = gusMouseXPos;
00529       sScreenY = gusMouseYPos;
00530 
00531       pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pStructHead;
00532 
00533       while( pNode != NULL )
00534       {
00535             {
00536                   GetLevelNodeScreenRect( pNode, &aRect, sXMapPos, sYMapPos , sGridNo );
00537 
00538                   // Make sure we are always on guy if we are on same gridno
00539                   if ( IsPointInScreenRect( sScreenX, sScreenY, &aRect ) )
00540                   {
00541                         // OK refine it!
00542                         if ( RefinePointCollisionOnStruct( sGridNo, sScreenX, sScreenY, (INT16)aRect.iLeft, (INT16)aRect.iBottom, pNode ) )
00543                         {
00544                               // Do some additional checks here!
00545                               if ( RefineLogicOnStruct( sGridNo, pNode ) )
00546                               {
00547 
00548                                     gCurIntTile.fFound = TRUE;
00549 
00550                                     // Only if we are not currently cycling....
00551                                     if ( !gfCycleIntTile )
00552                                     {
00553                                           // Accumulate them!
00554                                           gCurIntTileStack.bTiles[ gCurIntTileStack.bNum ].pFoundNode       = pNode;
00555                                           gCurIntTileStack.bTiles[ gCurIntTileStack.bNum ].sFoundGridNo = sGridNo;
00556                                           gCurIntTileStack.bNum++;
00557 
00558 
00559                                           // Determine if it's the best one
00560                                           if ( aRect.iBottom > gCurIntTile.sHeighestScreenY )
00561                                           {
00562                                                 gCurIntTile.sMaxScreenY = (UINT16)aRect.iBottom;
00563                                                 gCurIntTile.sHeighestScreenY = gCurIntTile.sMaxScreenY;
00564 
00565                                                 // Set it!
00566                                                 gCurIntTile.pFoundNode = pNode;
00567                                                 gCurIntTile.sFoundGridNo = sGridNo;
00568 
00569                                                 // Set stack current one...
00570                                                 gCurIntTileStack.bCur = gCurIntTileStack.bNum-1;
00571                                           }
00572                                     }
00573                               }
00574                         }
00575                   }
00576 
00577                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
00578             }
00579       }
00580 
00581 }
00582 
00583 
00584 LEVELNODE *InternalGetCurInteractiveTile( BOOLEAN fRejectItemsOnTop )
00585 {
00586       LEVELNODE *pNode = NULL;
00587       STRUCTURE   *pStructure = NULL;
00588 
00589       // OK, Look for our tile!
00590 
00591       // Check for shift down!
00592       if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
00593       {
00594             return( NULL );
00595       }
00596 
00597 
00598       if ( gfOverIntTile )
00599       {
00600             pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ gCurIntTile.sGridNo   ].pStructHead;
00601 
00602             while( pNode != NULL )
00603             {
00604                   if ( pNode->usIndex == gCurIntTile.sTileIndex )
00605                   {
00606                         if ( fRejectItemsOnTop )
00607                         {
00608                               // get strucuture here...
00609                               if ( gCurIntTile.fStructure )
00610                               {
00611                                     pStructure = FindStructureByID( gCurIntTile.sGridNo, gCurIntTile.usStructureID );
00612                                     if (pStructure != NULL)
00613                                     {
00614                                           if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_HASITEMONTOP )
00615                                           {
00616                                                 return( NULL );
00617                                           }
00618                                     }
00619                                     else
00620                                     {
00621                                           return( NULL );
00622                                     }
00623                               }
00624                         }
00625 
00626                         return( pNode );
00627                   }
00628 
00629                   pNode = pNode->pNext;
00630             }
00631       }
00632 
00633       return( NULL );
00634 }

00643 
00644 LEVELNODE *GetCurInteractiveTileGridNo( INT16 *psGridNo )
00645 {
00646       LEVELNODE *pNode;
00647       
00648       pNode = GetCurInteractiveTile( );
00649 
00650       if ( pNode != NULL )
00651       {
00652             *psGridNo = gCurIntTile.sGridNo;
00653       }
00654       else
00655       {
00656             *psGridNo = NOWHERE;
00657       }
00658 
00659       return( pNode );
00660 }
00661

00663 
00664 LEVELNODE *ConditionalGetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( INT16 *psGridNo, STRUCTURE **ppStructure, BOOLEAN fRejectOnTopItems )
00665 {
00666       LEVELNODE *pNode;
00667       STRUCTURE   *pStructure;
00668 
00669       *ppStructure = NULL;
00670       
00671       pNode = InternalGetCurInteractiveTile( fRejectOnTopItems );
00672 
00673       if ( pNode != NULL )
00674       {
00675             *psGridNo = gCurIntTile.sGridNo;
00676       }
00677       else
00678       {
00679             *psGridNo = NOWHERE;
00680       }
00681 
00682       if ( pNode != NULL )
00683       {
00684             if ( gCurIntTile.fStructure )
00685             {
00686                   pStructure = FindStructureByID( gCurIntTile.sGridNo, gCurIntTile.usStructureID );
00687                   if (pStructure == NULL)
00688                   {
00689                         *ppStructure = NULL;
00690                         return( NULL );
00691                   }
00692                   else
00693                   {
00694                         *ppStructure = pStructure;
00695                   }
00696             }
00697       }
00698 
00699       return( pNode );
00700 }
00701 
00702 
00703 LEVELNODE *GetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( INT16 *psGridNo, STRUCTURE **ppStructure )
00704 {
00705       return( ConditionalGetCurInteractiveTileGridNoAndStructure( psGridNo, ppStructure, TRUE ) );
00706 }

00708 
00709 void BeginCurInteractiveTileCheck( UINT8 bCheckFlags )
00710 {
00711       gfOverIntTile = FALSE;
00712 
00713       // OK, release our stack, stuff could be different!
00714       gfCycleIntTile = FALSE;
00715 
00716       // Reset some highest values
00717       gCurIntTile.sHeighestScreenY  = 0;
00718       gCurIntTile.fFound                                    = FALSE;
00719       gCurIntTile.ubFlags                                   = bCheckFlags;
00720 
00721       // Reset stack values
00722       gCurIntTileStack.bNum = 0;
00723 
00724 }
00725 
00726 void EndCurInteractiveTileCheck( )
00727 {
00728       CUR_INTERACTIVE_TILE          *pCurIntTile;
00729 
00730       if ( gCurIntTile.fFound )
00731       {
00732             // Set our currently cycled guy.....
00733             if ( gfCycleIntTile )
00734             {
00735                   // OK, we're over this cycled node
00736                   pCurIntTile = &( gCurIntTileStack.bTiles[ gCurIntTileStack.bCur ] );
00737             }
00738             else
00739             {
00740                   // OK, we're over this levelnode,
00741                   pCurIntTile = &gCurIntTile;
00742             }
00743 
00744             gCurIntTile.sGridNo                       = pCurIntTile->sFoundGridNo;
00745             gCurIntTile.sTileIndex    = pCurIntTile->pFoundNode->usIndex;
00746 
00747             if ( pCurIntTile->pFoundNode->pStructureData != NULL )
00748             {
00749                   gCurIntTile.usStructureID                 = pCurIntTile->pFoundNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
00750                   gCurIntTile.fStructure                    = TRUE;     
00751             }
00752             else
00753             {
00754                   gCurIntTile.fStructure                    = FALSE;    
00755             }
00756 
00757 
00758             gfOverIntTile                                         = TRUE;
00759 
00760       }
00761       else
00762       {
00763             // If we are in cycle mode, end it
00764             if ( gfCycleIntTile )
00765             {
00766                   gfCycleIntTile = FALSE;
00767             }
00768       }
00769 }
00770 
00771 
00772 BOOLEAN RefineLogicOnStruct( INT16 sGridNo, LEVELNODE *pNode )
00773 {
00774       TILE_ELEMENT *TileElem;
00775       STRUCTURE          *pStructure;
00776                         
00777 
00778       if ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_CACHEDANITILE )
00779       {
00780             return ( FALSE );
00781       }
00782 
00783 
00784       TileElem = &(gTileDatabase[pNode->usIndex]);
00785 
00786       if ( gCurIntTile.ubFlags == INTILE_CHECK_SELECTIVE )
00787       {
00788             // See if we are on an interactable tile!
00789             // Try and get struct data from levelnode pointer
00790             pStructure = pNode->pStructureData;
00791 
00792             // If no data, quit
00793             if ( pStructure == NULL )
00794             {
00795                   return( FALSE );
00796             }
00797 
00798             if ( !( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_OPENABLE | STRUCTURE_HASITEMONTOP ) ) )
00799             {
00800                   return( FALSE );
00801             }
00802 
00803             if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON )
00804             {
00805                   return( FALSE );
00806             }
00807 
00808             // If we are a door, we need a different definition of being visible than other structs
00809             if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR )
00810             {
00811                   if ( !IsDoorVisibleAtGridNo( sGridNo ) )
00812                   {
00813                         return( FALSE );
00814                   }
00815 
00816                   // OK, For a OPENED door, addition requirements are: need to be in 'HAND CURSOR' mode...
00817                   if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
00818                   {
00819                         //Are we in hand cursor mode?
00820                         if ( gCurrentUIMode != HANDCURSOR_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != ACTION_MODE )
00821                         {
00822                               return( FALSE );
00823                         }
00824                   }
00825 
00826                   // If this option is on...
00827                   if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SNAP_CURSOR_TO_DOOR ] )
00828                   {
00829                         if ( gCurrentUIMode != HANDCURSOR_MODE )
00830                         {
00831                               return( FALSE );
00832                         }
00833                   }                 
00834             }
00835             else
00836             {
00837                   // IF we are a switch, reject in another direction...
00838                   if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH )
00839                   {
00840                         // Find a new gridno based on switch's orientation...
00841                         INT16 sNewGridNo = NOWHERE;
00842 
00843                         switch( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubWallOrientation )
00844                         {
00845                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00846                               case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00847 
00848                                     // Move south...
00849                                     sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
00850                                     break;
00851 
00852                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00853                               case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00854 
00855                                     // Move east...
00856                                     sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
00857                                     break;
00858 
00859                         }
00860 
00861                         if ( sNewGridNo != NOWHERE )
00862                         {
00863                               // If we are hidden by a roof, reject it!
00864                               if ( !gfBasement && IsRoofVisible2( sNewGridNo ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_ITEMS ) )
00865                               {
00866                                     return( FALSE );
00867                               }
00868                         }
00869                   }
00870                   else
00871                   {
00872                         // If we are hidden by a roof, reject it!
00873                         if ( !gfBasement && IsRoofVisible( sGridNo ) && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_ITEMS ) )
00874                         {
00875                               return( FALSE );
00876                         }
00877                   }
00878             }
00879  
00880             // Check if it's a hidden struct and we have not revealed anything!
00881             if ( TileElem->uiFlags & HIDDEN_TILE )
00882             {
00883                   if ( !IsHiddenStructureVisible( sGridNo, pNode->usIndex ) )
00884                   {
00885                         // Return false
00886                         return( FALSE );
00887                   }
00888             }
00889       }
00890 
00891       return( TRUE );
00892 }
00893 
00894 
00895 BOOLEAN RefinePointCollisionOnStruct( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sTestX, INT16 sTestY, INT16 sSrcX, INT16 sSrcY, LEVELNODE *pNode )
00896 {
00897       TILE_ELEMENT *TileElem;
00898 
00899       if ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_CACHEDANITILE )
00900       {
00901             //Check it!
00902             return ( CheckVideoObjectScreenCoordinateInData( gpTileCache[ pNode->pAniTile->sCachedTileID ].pImagery->vo, pNode->pAniTile->sCurrentFrame, (INT32)( sTestX - sSrcX  ), (INT32)( -1 * ( sTestY - sSrcY  ) ) ) );
00903 
00904       }
00905       else
00906       {
00907             TileElem = &( gTileDatabase[pNode->usIndex] );
00908 
00909             //Adjust for current frames and animations....
00910             if ( TileElem->uiFlags & ANIMATED_TILE)
00911             {
00912                         Assert( TileElem->pAnimData != NULL );
00913                         TileElem = &gTileDatabase[TileElem->pAnimData->pusFrames[TileElem->pAnimData->bCurrentFrame]];
00914             }
00915             else if( ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_ANIMATION ) )
00916             {
00917                   if ( pNode->sCurrentFrame != -1  )
00918                   {
00919                         Assert( TileElem->pAnimData != NULL );
00920                         TileElem = &gTileDatabase[TileElem->pAnimData->pusFrames[pNode->sCurrentFrame]];
00921                   }
00922             }
00923 
00924             //Check it!
00925             return ( CheckVideoObjectScreenCoordinateInData( TileElem->hTileSurface, TileElem->usRegionIndex, (INT32)( sTestX - sSrcX  ), (INT32)( -1 * ( sTestY - sSrcY  ) ) ) );
00926       }
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 // This function will check the video object at SrcX and SrcY for the lack of transparency
00931 // will return true if data found, else false
00932 BOOLEAN CheckVideoObjectScreenCoordinateInData( HVOBJECT hSrcVObject, UINT16 usIndex, INT32 iTestX, INT32 iTestY )
00933 {
00934       UINT32 uiOffset;
00935       UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
00936       UINT8  *SrcPtr;
00937       UINT32 LineSkip;
00938       ETRLEObject *pTrav;
00939       BOOLEAN     fDataFound = FALSE;     
00940       INT32  iTestPos, iStartPos;   
00941   
00942       // Assertions
00943       Assert( hSrcVObject != NULL );
00944 
00945       // Get Offsets from Index into structure
00946       pTrav = &(hSrcVObject->pETRLEObject[ usIndex ] );
00947       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
00948       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
00949       uiOffset                      = pTrav->uiDataOffset;
00950 
00951 
00952       // Calculate test position we are looking for!
00953       // Calculate from 0, 0 at top left!
00954       iTestPos    = ( ( usHeight - iTestY ) * usWidth ) + iTestX;
00955       iStartPos   = 0;
00956       LineSkip  = usWidth;
00957 
00958       SrcPtr= (UINT8 *)hSrcVObject->pPixData + uiOffset;
00959 
00960       __asm {
00961 
00962             mov         esi, SrcPtr
00963             mov         edi, iStartPos
00964             xor         eax, eax
00965             xor         ebx, ebx
00966             xor         ecx, ecx
00967 
00968 BlitDispatch:
00969 
00970             mov         cl, [esi]
00971             inc         esi
00972             or          cl, cl
00973             js          BlitTransparent
00974             jz          BlitDoneLine
00975 
00976 //BlitNonTransLoop:
00977 
00978             clc
00979             rcr         cl, 1
00980             jnc         BlitNTL2
00981 
00982             inc         esi
00983             
00984             // Check
00985             cmp         edi, iTestPos
00986             je          BlitFound
00987             add         edi, 1
00988 
00989 
00990 BlitNTL2:
00991             clc
00992             rcr         cl, 1
00993             jnc         BlitNTL3
00994 
00995             add         esi, 2
00996 
00997             // Check
00998             cmp         edi, iTestPos
00999             je          BlitFound
01000             add         edi, 1
01001 
01002             // Check
01003             cmp         edi, iTestPos
01004             je          BlitFound
01005             add         edi, 1
01006 
01007 
01008 BlitNTL3:
01009 
01010             or          cl, cl
01011             jz          BlitDispatch
01012 
01013             xor         ebx, ebx
01014 
01015 BlitNTL4:
01016 
01017             add         esi, 4
01018 
01019             // Check
01020             cmp         edi, iTestPos
01021             je          BlitFound
01022             add         edi, 1
01023             
01024             // Check
01025             cmp         edi, iTestPos
01026             je          BlitFound
01027             add         edi, 1
01028 
01029             // Check
01030             cmp         edi, iTestPos
01031             je          BlitFound
01032             add         edi, 1
01033 
01034             // Check
01035             cmp         edi, iTestPos
01036             je          BlitFound
01037             add         edi, 1
01038 
01039             dec         cl
01040             jnz         BlitNTL4
01041 
01042             jmp         BlitDispatch
01043 
01044 BlitTransparent:
01045 
01046             and         ecx, 07fH
01047 //          shl         ecx, 1
01048             add         edi, ecx
01049             jmp         BlitDispatch
01050 
01051 
01052 BlitDoneLine:
01053                         
01054 // Here check if we have passed!
01055             cmp         edi, iTestPos
01056             jge         BlitDone
01057 
01058             dec         usHeight
01059             jz          BlitDone
01060 //          add         edi, LineSkip
01061             jmp         BlitDispatch
01062 
01063 
01064 BlitFound:
01065 
01066             mov         fDataFound, 1
01067 
01068 BlitDone:
01069       }
01070 
01071       return(fDataFound);
01072 
01073 }

01075 
01076 BOOLEAN ShouldCheckForMouseDetections( )
01077 {
01078       BOOLEAN fOK = FALSE;
01079 
01080       if ( gsINTOldRenderCenterX != gsRenderCenterX || gsINTOldRenderCenterY != gsRenderCenterY ||
01081                    gusINTOldMousePosX     != gusMouseXPos   || gusINTOldMousePosY   != gusMouseYPos   )
01082       {     
01083             fOK = TRUE;
01084       }
01085 
01086       // Set old values
01087       gsINTOldRenderCenterX = gsRenderCenterX;
01088       gsINTOldRenderCenterY = gsRenderCenterY;
01089 
01090       gusINTOldMousePosX            = gusMouseXPos;
01091       gusINTOldMousePosY            = gusMouseYPos;
01092 
01093       return( fOK );
01094 }

01096 
01097 void CycleIntTileFindStack( UINT16 usMapPos )
01098 {
01099       gfCycleIntTile = TRUE;
01100 
01101       // Cycle around!
01102       gCurIntTileStack.bCur++;
01103 
01104       //PLot new movement
01105       gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
01106 
01107       if ( gCurIntTileStack.bCur == gCurIntTileStack.bNum )
01108       {
01109             gCurIntTileStack.bCur = 0;
01110       }
01111 }
